article: Standing on the side of the highway waiting to catch speeding drivers, a police officer saw a car moving slowly at 18 MPH. He _ to himself, "This driver is just as _ as a speeder!" So _ he turned on his lights and pulled the driver over. _ the car, he noticed that _ were five old ladies -- two in the front seat and _ three in the back, their eyes wide and faces white as ghosts. The driver, obviously _ , said to him, "Officer, I don't understand. I was _ exactly the speed limit! _ seems to be the problem?"
